content: > **update 12/2021 ** > > i have now created a paid pdf version for > this blanket > > the pdf contains > > * written-only instructions for parts 1-3 of charlotte s universe forms the squares > * round-by-round charts by the very talented masako kawahara >* instructions and photos for layout joining and border the pdf has been created with much love and attention to details if you need help with any part of the squares links are provided to the free step-by-step photo tutorials and detailed video tutorials charlotte s dream is a crochet blanket that incorporates 12 charlotte squares in 12 contrasting colours it has a vibrant vintage feel which is both elegant and whimsical the blanket is 172 cm 68 x 130 cm 51 in size and has a simple popcorn edging to complement the intricate design of the squares this blanket was made by my dear friend jenny and we spent many happy hours talking about colours joining and border yarn packs for this pattern are available from my wool warehouse store here 1 we hope you love this design as much as we do dedri and jenny x 1 https //www woolwarehouse co uk/lookatwhatimade/charlottes-dream-blanket-pack-in-scheepjes-stonewashed-48-x-50g
